newsitem.title: USA: Hops Grill IPO pulled following merger deal.
newsitem.headline: Hops Grill IPO pulled following merger deal.

text.p: The proposed initial public offering of Hops Grill & Bar Inc has been pulled after the company's agreement to merge with Apple South Inc, said underwriter Raymond James & Associates.
Apple South announced a deal to acquire the Tampa, Florida-based company for $31.5 million in cash and stock on Feb 7.
Hops operates 18 full-service, casual dining restaurants in Florida, Colorado and Kentucky.
